snippet: Dr. Caliandro, who succeeded the Rev. Norman Vincent Peale as the senior minister at the Manhattan church, developed his own style by promoting women and focusing on local needs.
abstract: Rev Arthur Caliandro, who succeeded the Rev Norman Vincent Peale as senior minister at Marble Collegiate Church in Manhattan, dies at age 79.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Caliandro, who succeeded the Rev. Norman Vincent Peale as the senior minister at the Manhattan church, developed his own style by promoting women and focusing on local needs.

headline.seo: Arthur Caliandro, 79, Progressive Minister at Marble Collegiate Church
headline.main: Arthur Caliandro, Minister at Marble Collegiate, Dies at 79
headline.print_headline:
Rev. Arthur Caliandro, 79,
Minister Who Reached Out
